Prerequisite: Bankruptcy (concurrently okay) and Contract Drafting (concurrently NOT okay)
Preselected Transactional Certificate Students will receive an email informing them how/when to
enroll. Non-transactional certificate students who meet the pre-reqs may try to enroll during Open Enrollment.
prerequisites: Contract Drafting is a pre-requisite and Bankruptcy must be simultaneously enrolled in, or previously completed, to register for this course. Please contact Kelli.Pittman@emory.edu with all inquiries.
